name: Innovator Quest

rounds.name: Score It
rounds.description: Challenge your logic with twisted puzzles, story-based codes, and mental gymnastics! It’s not just a quiz — it’s a mind maze!

rounds.name: Build It
rounds.description: Create something clever using surprise materials — think fast, act faster! A hands-on innovation challenge that tests both your creativity and teamwork.

rounds.name: Think It
rounds.description: Raise your hand, raise your game! A fast-paced live quiz round where your instincts matter. No screens — just sharp minds and quick hands!

rules: Each team must have exactly 4 members (cross-branch teams recommended)
Same-branch teams are allowed but expect cross-domain challenges
Late entries will not be accepted
All team members must be present during registration
Use of mobile phones is strictly prohibited during rounds
scoring: Total 80 Points across all rounds. Hint system available.
description: A one-of-a-kind inter-branch showdown where innovation meets imagination! Think smart, build bold, and outplay the rest in this thrilling three-round event packed with puzzles, creativity, and pure genius.

name: Eco-Friendly Ganpati & Painting Competition

rounds.name: Eco-Friendly Ganpati Idol Making & Painting
rounds.description: Participants will showcase their creativity by making eco-friendly Ganpati idols and paintings.

rules: No specific rules — just creativity and eco-friendliness!
scoring: Judgement will be based on creativity, presentation, and eco-friendliness.
description: An artistic event celebrating Ganesh Chaturthi with eco-friendly practices. Create idols and paintings that blend tradition with sustainability!
